body:
[BREVARD COUNTY] – A Florida Man was arrested at a Starbucks after yelling obscenities, calling himself a saint and threatening to destroy everyone with his turtle army.

When authorities arrived, the Florida Man, 61-year old Thomas Devaney Lane, called 911 and told the operator, “I need to leave now or you will all be sorry you (expletive) with the saint,” a Police affidavit states. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Threatens to Destroy Everyone with his Army of Turtles

body:
[DAYTONA BEACH] – A Florida Man taunted deputies on his motorcycle, revving it loudly before taking off and reaching speeds of nearly 100mph. It didn’t end well.

23-year-old Russel Gortzig was found lying the front yard of a home, with both leg and facial injuries.

According to deputies, the Florida Man began provoking them around 7 p.m, driving past the Volusia County Sheriff’s District 4 office, revving the motor, and taunting deputies outside before speeding off.

Several deputies spotted him again at various locations, but he continued to taunt them and speed off, going 70mph in a 40mph zone, as well as recklessly overtaking vehicles in a no-passing zone.

Witnesses say he was going nearly 100mph before he lost control and crashed into a tree. The motorcycle was seriously damaged, and Gortzig was airlifted to Central Florida Regional Hospital. He faces charges of fleeing and attempting to elude, reckless driving, and driving with a suspended license, according to the police report. Original Article
headline: Florida Man on Motorcycle Taunts Deputies, Then Crashes into Tree

body:
[PORT RICHEY] –  A Florida Man and former Mayor of Port Richey is charged with attempted murder, practicing medicine without a license, and conspiracy.

68-year-old Dale Massad, is said to have abused crystal meth and crack cocaine. Witnesses told investigators about eating and snorting meth before golfing, as well as smoking crack cocaine from a pipe he made from a golf club.

Massad is said to have hired runners to collect drugs for him throughout his time in office, as well as performing unlicensed medical services from his home. He was licensed to do so from 1977-1992, however, he voluntarily revoked his priveledges after a malpractice accusation which resulted in the death of a patient in 1990.

He was also charged with conspiracy after authorities say Massad was recorded on a jail phone plotting to intimidate a police officer involved in the malpractice case.

The Florida Man and former Mayor also faces attempted murder charges after firing on a SWAT team during a raid that was conducted at his home. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Mayor Smokes Crack, Eats Meth, Practices Medicine Without License, Fires on SWAT Team

body:
[FORT MYERS] – A Florida Man was arrested for indecent exposure on Sunday after showing up to Lee Memorial Hospital completely naked.

According to an arrest report, 69-year-old Irving Howard arrived at the hospital and approached officers that were engaged in an assault investigation.

Initially, Howard was fully clothed. Police asked him to leave, and he obliged.

A few minutes later, the Florida Man returned, fully naked, and told police, “I’m ready to go.”

When police asked him where his clothes went, Howard said he didn’t know they were gone.

He was arrested on indecent exposure charges. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Shows up to Hospital Naked, Says He’s “Ready to Go”

body:
[FORT PIERCE] – A Florida Man who was found driving around with his pants down alongside a prostitute says he was just “working out”.

Police recognized the woman as “a prostitute here in Fort Pierce.” The Florida Man, 47-year-old Lionel Briscoe, told officers he didn’t know the woman.

The woman told police that Briscoe gave her a $20 bill in exchange for a sex act. He was arrested on a misdemeanor sex offense. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Driving Around with Pants down Says He Was Just Working out

body:
[VERO LAKE ESTATES] – A Florida Man was arrested after driving his vehicle through a gate at City Cab Towing, according to the Indian River County Sheriff’s Office.

“They stole my car, so I stole it back,” The Florida Man told deputies.

The Florida Man, James Rinella of Vero Lake Estates, was charged with Burglary and Felony Criminal Mischief, and taken to Indian River County Jail with bond set at $8,500. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Steals Car Back from Towing Company, Smashes Through Gate

body: [NEW PORT RICHEY] – A Florida Man was arrested for a nearly 18-year unsolved murder – just minutes after being released from prison for another crime. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Back in Jail for Murder Minutes After Being Released

body:
[TALLAHASSEE] – A  Florida Man faces charges for an alleged savage attack on his parents over a pork chop.

According to court documents, 28-year-old Austin Day complained that the pork chop prepared for him by his father was “too acidic”, and accused his parents of trying to poison him.

Then, without warning, Day smashed a glass mug over his mother’s head before chasing after and stabbing his father with a knife.

Day’s parents told officers that Day had recently become increasingly paranoid. He is being held at the Leon County Detention Facility and is charged with two counts of attempted homicide. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Attacks Parents over Pork Chop

body:
[PALMETTO BAY] – A Florida Man faces charges after breaking into a South Village hall building and causing $500,000 in damages.

According to an arrest report, 38-year-old Holdson Marcelin smashed the entrance of the building with a garbage can, destroyed items, and office equipment. He was also caught on surveillance video cutting himself and smearing blood on the walls and an American flag.

Marclein was charged with burglary, criminal mischief and causing property damage. He is currently in jail without bond. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Breaks into Village Hall, Causes $500,000 in Damages, Smears Blood on American Flag

body:
[KEY WEST] – A Florida Man who just purchased a multi-million dollar private island off Key West was arrested for shoplifting at a local Kmart.

59-year old Andrew Lippi allegedly stole nearly $300 of household goods, including LED bulbs and a $150 Keurig coffee machine. According to police, he placed cheaper items inside the boxes, such as a basketball inside the Keurig box, then returned them for a refund.

Lippi says he paid to much for the items and told the Miami Herald that the situation “has to do with a commercial dispute.”

Lippi was arrested on grand theft charges. He was released the following day. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Steals from Kmart Days After Buying $8 Million Private Island

[SARASOTA] –  A Florida Man and serial “Youtube Prankster” faces felony charges after playing an April Fools joke on a woman and her two children in Sarasota.

Police say 25-year old Charles Ross approached the woman in a Walmart parking lot and attempted to cite her on fake traffic charges.

Ross was wearing a full police uniform, including a baton on his belt. Suspicious, the woman disregarded him and called the police.

Ross, who has a history of similar pranks which he posts on Youtube, faces charges of impersonating a police officer. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Pretending to Be Cop for Youtube Views Gets Arrested

body:
[TAMPA] – Hours before his Northdale rental went up in flames, investigators say Patrick O’Brien, lead guitarist for the death metal band Cannibal Corpse, called relatives warning about “the rapture” and that “aliens have landed.”

The next day, after the fire subsided, fire marshals found a large cache of weapon, locked safes and potential explosive devices inside the home the 53-year-old O’Brien rented at 16311 Northwood Dr.

The stash included about 50 shotguns — including one with a barrel illegally sawed off to about an inch past the stock — 10 semiautomatic rifles including a couple of AK-47 variants, two Uzi-style rifles and 20 handguns, according to a search warrant. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Says Aliens Have Landed, Burns down House Stocked with Flamethrowers and Ammo

body:
[LAKELAND] – A Florida Man and sandwich connoisseur has become the subject of a manhunt after stealing a foot-long sub, which he proceeded to hide down the front of his pants.

The as-yet-unidentified thief stole the snack from a gas station in the city of Lakeland on November 25, according to the local Channel 8 News station.

On Monday, the Polk County Sheriff’s Office released CCTV images of the foot-long fan in a bid to identify him. A post on the office’s Facebook page explained that the theft occurred at around 8:45 PM before the suspect escaped on a bike. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Shoves Footlong Sandwich down His Pants

[SPRING HILL] – A 24-year-old man in Hernando County was arrested Wednesday for stealing two pairs of women’s shoes from a Kohls where he had just interviewed for a job.

He didn’t get the position and now deputies say Dominick Breedlove is facing charges for retail theft.

Breedlove didn’t know he was being monitored by a loss prevention employee while he searched through the shoes, scouring for missing security tags deputies say. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Goes to Job Interview, Then Steals Shoes to Give to his Mom

body:
[SEBASTIAN] – A Florida Man was arrested Sunday night after calling 911 multiple times and asking Sebastian police to take him to jail, reports show.

Gary Lee Meadows, 62, charged with abusing the 911 service and criminal mischief after calling police multiple times. When police arrived, he yelled from his bedroom “come take me to jail you mother fu**er, there is no emergency here, and I called 911 fa**ot,” the report said.

As the officer asked Meadows to come out of his bedroom and into the living area, he yelled “are you scared you fu**ing pu**y,” the affidavit said. The officer walked into his bedroom and placed him under arrest. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Calls 911, Tells Cops: “Take Me to Jail, Motherf*cker!”

Video shows a different man riding his bike up to the restaurant at 358 22nd Ave S, pedaling around the parking lot for 10 minutes, then slipping in through the back gate. He opens the door to a shed after wandering around for a bit, then removes a set of bongos. Original Article

When they arrived, the officers saw white smoke coming from the house and could smell something burning, according to the incident report.

A man, later identified as James Gregory Cunningham, answered the door, said he was sorry and then closed it. The individual was naked, said the report, and in “a smoke-filled house with items on fire inside it,” such as towels. Original Article

body:
[DUNEDIN] – The Kobe Japanese Steakhouse in Clearwater, Fla., offers a variety of choice meats, sushi specialties, and a pretty generous happy hour deal. The one thing they don’t offer, however, are live nude shows.

Not always, anyway.

James Dylan Jordan, a 24-year-old restaurant patron from nearby Dunedin, was arrested and charged with disorderly conduct after he drunkenly approached a couple of Kobe diners last Sunday night and offered them an impromptu striptease, The Tampa Bay Times reported. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Goes to Japanese Steakhouse, Starts Stripping in Front of Customers

body:
[MARATHON] – A Florida Man was arrested after he allegedly threatened to “blow up” a woman’s home when she refused his sexual advances.

Waiter Nicholas Kevin Chew, 41, from Marathon, Florida, was arrested on Saturday, after he allegedly threatened his girlfriend’s friend after she declined to have sex with him, the Miami Herald first reported. Monroe County Sheriff’s Department deputies arrived on Saturday at 2:46 p.m. at the American Legion in Marathon after they received a call from the victim saying Chew had sent her threatening text messages, according to the police report obtained by Newsweek. Original Article
headline: Florida Man Threatens to Blow up Lesbian Woman’s Home After Denying His Sexual Advances
